rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0001
rows.name: So Metsu got away with the Iiran Seal...

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0002
rows.name: If only I could have used my power...

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0003
rows.name:
But if you'd used your power,
Hikari, a lot of civilians would
have been hurt.

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0006
rows.name: It's frustrating, but he outplayed us.

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0007
rows.name:
Luckily, that whimsical
Heaven's Holy Grail says he'll
give us some more time.

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0008
rows.name:
There's still a lot we can do,
isn't there?

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0010
rows.name:
At times like these,
we have to force ourselves
to look forward.

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0012
rows.name:
Let's have Shin make us
lots of delicious food.

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0013
rows.name:
I don't think we need to
celebrate that much, but...

rows.label: campfev11_590_100_msg0014
rows.name:
First, we'll meet the King of Iira
and give our report.
Everything else can wait.
